author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign BEST RELICS & What They Do
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be going through the best relics what their effects are, and why they're good as well as the character effects that are specific to each class. And talking about why they're so good. We're going to get into the exact specifics of what these relics do, not like a general hypothesis on the effects of these, but we're going to get into the actual numbers of what they represent.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
